OOC: Please, you don't have to scream. Inferno was brought back as a 
prisoner. On the other hand, he was still in pretty bad shape the last 
time I heard of him, not to say in stasis lock, if I remember. Maybe 
you should consider reposting this, Catmastero.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> OOC: THIS IS RIDICULOUS!  YOU NEVER POSTED HIM HEALING, OR COMING TO 
> THE BASE!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "catmastero" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > Sunhawk got to the base.  He scanned it and saw both the Preds 
> had 
> > > escaped.  He managed to manuever in flight mode through the 
halls 
> > > (knocking minimul stuff over of course) 4 or 5 times faster than 
> > > running.  He landed and transformed right in front of them.
> > > 
> > > Sunhawk:  If you wanted a drink of energon you could have just 
> > > asked.  Now on the tables both of you.  I intend to make sure 
> > you're 
> > > both properly restrained this time.
> > > 
> > > He draws him energon sword and holds it at close distance before 
> > they 
> > > have time to draw they're weapons so they'll get slashed if they 
> do.
> > > 
> > Inferno creeped along the roof in his beast mode, it had taken 
some 
> > time for his beast form to heal him and he had followed Drillbit 
> out 
> > of the brige "Inferno Terrorize" He exclaimed and landed on the 
> floor 
> > in robot mode and drew his weapon "your power is useless against 
> the 
> > royalty"
